Package com.github.themrmilchmann.mjl.events

Class EventDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.themrmilchmann.mjl.events.EventDispatcher
  • public abstract class EventDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    An object that takes care of submitting events to subscribers.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      EventDispatcher()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static EventDispatcher directDispatcher()
      Returns a dispatcher that dispatches events directly.
      protected abstract void dispatch​(Event event, java.util.Collection<EventBus.Subscriber> subscribers)
      Dispatches the event to the subscribers.
      static EventDispatcher perThreadDispatchQueue()
      Returns a dispatcher that that guarantees that all events that are posted in a single thread are dispatched to their subscribers in the order they are posted by queuing events that are posted reentrantly on a thread.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventDispatcher

        public EventDispatcher()

    • Method Detail

      • directDispatcher

        public static EventDispatcher directDispatcher()
        Returns a dispatcher that dispatches events directly. The dispatcher dispatches all events directly upon receiving them without any additional processing or computation. Thus, events are dispatched in the order in which they are received.
        Returns:
        a dispatcher that dispatches events directly
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • perThreadDispatchQueue

        public static EventDispatcher perThreadDispatchQueue()
        Returns a dispatcher that that guarantees that all events that are posted in a single thread are dispatched to their subscribers in the order they are posted by queuing events that are posted reentrantly on a thread.
        Returns:
        a dispatcher that guarantees that all events that are posted in a single thread are dispatched to their subscribers in the order they are posted.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • dispatch

        protected abstract void dispatch​(Event event,
                                 java.util.Collection<EventBus.Subscriber> subscribers)
        Dispatches the event to the subscribers.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to dispatch
        subscribers - the subscribers to dispatch the event to
        Since:
        1.0.0
